title: Whispering In Prayer Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Whispering In Prayer Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Whispering In Prayer Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 138
items.arabic: ((أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ، وَاتْفُلْ عَلَى يَسَارِكَ (ثلاثاً))).
